translation.en: [man] It was a waking dream,
the kind that arrives in the twilight between sleep and the real world.
translation.it: di quelli che fai tra il sonno e il mondo reale.

translation.en: I sat straight up in bed and said out loud,
translation.it: Mi sono messo seduto e ho detto:

translation.en: "I'm going to be President of the United States."
It does seem to be the hot job everyone aspires to nowadays.
translation.it: Un lavoro a cui tutti aspirano, ultimamente.

translation.en: The air of impossibility has been removed.
translation.it: L'aura di impossibilità è stata rimossa.

translation.en: I had that dream when I was seven years old, Dean Lawrence, and I've spent my entire life studying the lives of former presidents
translation.it: Ho fatto quel sogno a sette anni e ho studiato la vita degli ex presidenti

translation.en: to identify common experiences and traits that led to their inevitable election victories.
translation.it: per identificarne i tratti comuni che li hanno portati alla vittoria.

translation.en: Such as?
I only went back as far as Reagan. As far as I'm concerned, he created the modern presidency,
translation.it: Mi sono fermato a Reagan, perché ha inventato la presidenza moderna.

translation.en: the presidency of television and celebrity.
translation.it: La presidenza della televisione e della celebrità.

translation.en: People like to think of their presidents as characters they see on TV.
Most never actually see them in real life.
translation.it: Nessuno li conosce nella vita reale.

translation.en: Reagan and Bush Sr. were both presidents of their senior classes in high school.
translation.it: Reagan e Bush Sr. erano presidenti del corpo studentesco al liceo.

translation.en: Which, I assume, you are on your way to accomplishing.
translation.it: Cosa a cui punti anche tu.

translation.en: I believe I have the election well in hand, yes.
translation.it: Credo di avere le elezioni in pugno, sì.

translation.en: Interestingly, Reagan, Clinton, and Obama were all born into poverty while the Bushes were both highborn.
translation.it: Reagan, Clinton e Obama sono nati poveri, mentre i Bush erano ricchi.

translation.en: How do you reconcile that with your master plan?
translation.it: Come si inserisce questo nel tuo grande piano?

translation.en: Well, I have the good fortune of being born both rich and poor.
translation.it: Io sono nato sia ricco che povero.

translation.en: Your family has generational wealth.
Yes, true, but I’m also the only son of a cocktail waitress
translation.it: Ma sono anche figlio di una cameriera

translation.en: from the Landing Strip Gentlemen's Club in Laconia, New Hampshire.
translation.it: di uno strip club del New Hampshire.

translation.en: -You’re adopted. -Yes.
Why Harvard, Payton?
Harvard's produced more presidents than any other school. Seven.
translation.it: Avete il record di presidenti. Sette.

translation.en: Hmm. Well, I appreciate that.
You’re clearly a very well-prepared young man. Polished.
translation.it: Sei chiaramente un ragazzo molto preparato. Distinto.

translation.en: Thank you, Dean Lawrence.
But I’m not here to see the polish.
You're concerned about my GPA?
-Because I've-- -I don’t care about your grades.
translation.it: Non mi importa dei tuoi voti.

translation.en: I want to know you.
The real you.
Have you ever been compelled to go meet your birth mother?
translation.it: Hai mai desiderato incontrare la tua vera madre?

translation.en: My real mother has always been my greatest champion and closest confidant.
translation.it: Mia madre è la mia più grande sostenitrice e confidente.

translation.en: When was the last time you cried?
I cried at the end of It’s a Wonderful Life last Christmas.
translation.it: Alla fine di La vita è meravigliosa.

translation.en: Everyone cries at the end of that movie.
I know.
Did you cry because you were moved or because you felt like you were supposed to?
translation.it: Hai pianto perché eri commosso o perché sentivi di doverlo fare?

translation.en: Does it matter?
You were great.
I’ve noticed... every time we have sex,
no matter what I do, you seem to really enjoy it.
translation.it: sembra ti piaccia tutto ciò che faccio.

translation.en: I don’t know, I feel like, maybe, sometimes, you’re faking it.
translation.it: Non lo so, forse a volte fingi.

translation.en: I am.
I don’t like you pretending. I mean,
translation.it: Non voglio che tu faccia finta.

translation.en: aren’t we supposed to be generating intimacy?
Sure, but we're also giving you the self-confidence you need to become the man I know you can be.
translation.it: Certo, ma così ti fornisco l'autostima per diventare l'uomo che puoi essere.

translation.en: I know you watch porn.
Your brain is wired to enjoy sex that's presentational.
translation.it: Il tuo cervello è programmato per certe cose.

translation.en: -Okay, but I don’t want presentational. -[giggles]
translation.it: Ok, ma a me non piacciono le messe in scena.

translation.en: I want authentic.
I will do better at appearing more authentic from now on.
translation.it: Allora cercherò di sembrare più autentica.

translation.en: I don’t want you to appear authentic, I want you to be authentic.
translation.it: Io voglio che tu sia autentica.

translation.en: I don’t understand. What’s the difference?
I promise to be more real from now on.
-Where you going? -I have a surf lesson.
translation.it: - Dove vai? - A lezione di surf.

translation.en: We’re going back to Hawaii this Christmas
and I refuse to let my dad call me Barney and vanquish me to the ankle busters.
translation.it: e mi rifiuto di lasciarmi umiliare ancora da papà.

translation.en: Let there be one place he doesn’t find me a complete disappointment.
translation.it: Voglio che sia fiero di me almeno per una cosa.

translation.en: Hey, he thinks you're great.
He thinks I’m pretty. And he likes pretty things.
translation.it: Mi trova carina. E gli piacciono le cose belle.

translation.en: [man] River!
-River! -[River] I'm in here.
You traitor. You backstabbing son of a bitch.
You know how important this is to me. How dare you run against me?
translation.it: Sai quanto conta per me! Come osi sfidarmi?

translation.en: -Oh, I know. Listen, calm down-- -No. You calm down. I have the floor now.
translation.it: - Senti, calmati... - No, calmati tu. Parlo io adesso.

translation.en: Since when have you wanted to be the president? This wasn’t even your idea, was it?
translation.it: Da quando vuoi fare il presidente? Non è una tua idea, vero?

translation.en: No, it was Astrid's idea.
She said I had to do it if I had a shot of getting into Stanford and...
translation.it: Ha detto che mi avrebbe aiutato a entrare a Stanford.

translation.en: I had to do something to get my parents off my back. Screw you. Do you not understand you're gonna beat me?
translation.it: - Dovevo tranquillizzare i miei. - Fottiti. Non capisci che mi batterai?

translation.en: Okay? You're better looking than me. You're more popular, co-captain of the lacrosse team, so--
translation.it: Sei più carino, sei popolare, co-capitano della squadra di lacrosse...

translation.en: You're blowing this thing way out of proportion.
The moment you win, I'll tell everyone that we had sex and you're living a lie.
translation.it: Dirò a tutti che abbiamo fatto sesso e che menti.

translation.en: So, there's that.
-Payton. -I'm warning you,
do not screw with my dream. All right? I'm on a singular path. Okay?
translation.it: Non rovinare il mio sogno. Va bene? Sto seguendo un percorso eccezionale.

translation.en: You're not gonna get in the way, or I swear to God, I will make you pay.
translation.it: Non ti mettere in mezzo o giuro su Dio che te la farò pagare.

translation.en: Okay? So don't mess with me, River.
Are we clear?
I've never seen you like this.
translation.it: Non ti ho mai visto così.

translation.en: I don't recognize this person.
Well, I don't care, okay? I'm not a box, right?
translation.it: Non m'importa. Non sono una scatola.

translation.en: I don't need to have four sides for you to look at and approve of, okay?
translation.it: Non ho quattro facce che tu guardi e approvi, ok?

translation.en: I have-- I have feelings, River. These aren't feelings, you're just hysterical.
translation.it: - Ho dei sentimenti. - Questi non sono sentimenti, è isteria.

translation.en: Well, this is the true me.
This is who I am. I'm a winner.
I'mma win at all costs.
translation.it: Vincerò a tutti i costi. So come sarà il mio futuro

translation.en: I know what my future's gonna be and I know how to get there.
translation.it: Vincerò a tutti i costi. So come sarà il mio futuro e so come arrivarci.

translation.en: And I will not be stopped.
[woman] We have time for one more question each before closing statements.
translation.it: Abbiamo tempo per un'ultima domanda prima della chiusura.

translation.en: Payton, Mark Twain's classic novel Huckleberry Finn
translation.it: Payton, il classico di Mark Twain, Huckleberry Finn,

translation.en: is part of this school's freshman year English curriculum.
translation.it: fa parte del programma del primo anno.

translation.en: Do you believe racial epithets should be removed from Huck Finn before it is taught to students?
translation.it: Gli epiteti razziali dovrebbero essere rimossi prima che venga insegnato?

translation.en: Well, first of all, thank you, Vicki, for your years of service as part of our yearbook club,
translation.it: Prima di tutto, grazie, Vicki, per il tuo servizio nel club dell'annuario

translation.en: and thank you for what is a very thoughtful and provocative question.
translation.it: e grazie per la domanda molto intelligente e provocatoria.

translation.en: Now, this question doesn't have an easy answer,
so all I can give you is an honest answer.
No. We should not be rewriting literary giants like Mark Twain.
translation.it: No. Non dovremmo riscrivere i giganti letterari come Mark Twain.

translation.en: Mark Twain loathed racial inequality, and through the eyes of Huckleberry Finn,
translation.it: Twain detestava la disparità razziale e, attraverso gli occhi di Huckleberry Finn,

translation.en: he was attempting to shine a light on the...
the heinous, shameful sin of slavery,
and the systemic racism that pervaded every aspect of his life in the environment in which he was raised.
translation.it: e sul razzismo sistemico dell'ambiente in cui era cresciuto.

translation.en: But make no mistake, the racism that Mark Twain wrote about
translation.it: Ma non illudiamoci. Il razzismo di cui parlava Twain non è stato bandito dalla storia.

translation.en: has not been banished to the ash heap of history,
translation.it: Il razzismo di cui parlava Twain non è stato bandito dalla storia.

translation.en: it's with us in this room today.
translation.it: È con noi in questa stanza.

translation.en: Right? It's different, to be sure. It's... more subtle.
translation.it: No? È diverso, certamente, è più subdolo.

translation.en: But we have a long way to go towards true racial equality in this country,
translation.it: Ma la vera uguaglianza razziale non esiste ancora e,

translation.en: and as student body president, I'll ensure every student at this school
translation.it: come presidente, mi assicurerò che ogni studente

translation.en: has an equal opportunity to succeed,
regardless of their color, creed, national origin,
translation.it: a prescindere da colore, credo, provenienza,

translation.en: gender, sexual orientation, genetic information, or disability.
translation.it: sesso, orientamento sessuale, dati genetici o disabilità.

translation.en: If you choose to honor me by electing me, I will fight for each and every one of you
translation.it: Se mi farete l'onore di eleggermi, combatterò per tutti voi finché ne avrò la forza.

translation.en: so as long as there is strength in me to fight.
translation.it: combatterò per tutti voi finché ne avrò la forza.

translation.en: So, give me your vote, and help me lead this great school into the future.
translation.it: Datemi il vostro voto e aiutatemi a condurre questa scuola nel futuro.

translation.en: Thank you.
[man] River, last question.
Uh, should the school be able to limit the size of sugary drinks sold at Saint Sebastian?
translation.it: La scuola dovrebbe limitare le dimensioni delle bevande zuccherate vendute?

translation.en: I mean...
Yeah? No?
Who cares?
No, sorry. I appreciate the question, it's a good question.
translation.it: No, scusi. Apprezzo la domanda, è una buona domanda.

translation.en: I think it's important that we make smart decisions about the food we eat.
translation.it: È importante scegliere bene il cibo che mangiamo.

translation.en: I just feel like,
it's hardly the most pressing thing that any of us are dealing with.
translation.it: non sia la cosa più urgente con cui abbiamo a che fare.

translation.en: -The world is dark, yeah? -[softly] Oh, my.
translation.it: - Il mondo è ostile, vero? - Oh, cielo!

translation.en: And I think teenagers nowadays realize that.
translation.it: E penso che ora gli adolescenti lo capiscano.

translation.en: And... I don't know, it kind of feels like the world's ending.
translation.it: E... Sembra che il mondo stia per finire.

translation.en: So, you know, if a 42-ounce Mountain Dew makes you happy, I say go for it.
translation.it: Quindi, se una bibita gigante ti fa felice, fa' pure.

translation.en: I keep thinking that, uh, the only thing we all share together
translation.it: Continuo a pensare che l'unica cosa che ci accomuna

translation.en: is that we’re all alone.
And we take pictures, and we post them,
and we Facebook and Insta and Tweet and Snap and everything and...
translation.it: Scattiamo foto e le postiamo su Facebook, Insta, Tweet, Snap e tutto il resto...

translation.en: it just makes it worse.
[whispers] Ah, man.
I tried to kill myself last year.
translation.it: Ho tentato il suicidio l'anno scorso.

translation.en: Yeah, I never-- I never told anyone that.
translation.it: Non l'ho mai detto a nessuno.

translation.en: [chuckles] This is weird, I'm up here, you guys-- Can we--
translation.it: È strano, sono qui, voi lì.

translation.en: Can I come down there and talk to you? This is--
We're friends. We know each other
-[cheering] -We don't have to do this.
-We can have a serious conversation. -Okay, he's walking.
translation.it: Possiamo fare una conversazione seria... Ok, sta camminando.

translation.en: So, it was, uh, like, about a year ago, and...
translation.it: È stato circa un anno fa e...

translation.en: I don't know, I was just feeling really depressed.
translation.it: Non so, mi sentivo molto depresso.

translation.en: Not even depressed, just... just hopeless, because, um...
because I felt so alone. And I, uh...
I was afraid I was always gonna feel that way.
translation.it: e temevo sarebbe stato sempre così.

translation.en: -He's crying. This is bad, this is bad. -And, so I...
translation.it: - Piange. Non va bene. - Un giorno

translation.en: I went home after lax practice one day and I was working out at home...
translation.it: ero a casa dopo gli allenamenti e facevo esercizi.

translation.en: and something made me take a 45-pound plate and, uh...
translation.it: Per qualche motivo, ho preso un peso da venti chili

translation.en: I tied it to my ankle
and I went out to my pool and I jumped in the deep end.
translation.it: Poi mi sono buttato in piscina.

translation.en: And, for a second, I was really...
I was really ready to die.
And then I, like, realized. I was, like, "River, what did you just do?"
translation.it: Poi mi sono chiesto cos'avessi fatto.

translation.en: And I panicked and I tried to get the rope off my ankle and I couldn't.
translation.it: Mi sono agitato, cercavo di liberarmi, ma non ci riuscivo.

translation.en: And I just remember looking up at the surface of the water and thinking,
translation.it: Guardavo la superficie dell'acqua e pensavo:

translation.en: "No one's here, man.
You're gonna die alone."
And then, um...
next thing I remember I was floating at the surface.
There's no cool ending to the story, it's just the rope untied itself from the weight.
translation.it: Niente di che, semplicemente la corda si era slegata.

translation.en: -I don't know, I never did Boy Scouts. -[all chuckling]
No one was there.
Oh, God, he's sweating like Nixon.
I don't want anyone here at this school to ever feel like that.
translation.it: Non voglio che anche voi vi sentiate mai così.

translation.en: It's really important to me that all of you know
that your lives have value.
And that they're important.
That you're important.
That’s all I got to say.
I love this guy.
[Vicki] Candidates, it's now time for your closing statements.
translation.it: Candidati, è il momento delle dichiarazioni finali.

translation.en: I’ll pick it up.
People lie, numbers don't. River's ahead of you ten points post-debate.
translation.it: River è davanti di dieci punti dopo il dibattito.

translation.en: And if you dig down the tabs at the polls, he is leading you in looks, charisma,
translation.it: E, dai sondaggi, lui ti batte in aspetto, carisma

translation.en: and, most importantly, authenticity.
Basically crushing you in that department. Especially after that masterclass he put on during the debate.
translation.it: Ti sta schiacciando, specialmente dopo quella masterclass.

translation.en: Girls love it when a guy who looks like that cries.
Not blubbery at all, more of a silent, sexy cry.
Okay, fine, why don't all of you just vote for him, then?
translation.it: Andate a votare per lui, allora.

translation.en: Our loyalty is with you, Payton. This is a plane. We're all headed to the same place. You're the pilot, James and I are your navigators.
translation.it: Noi siamo con te, questo è un aereo. Tu sei il pilota, io e James i navigatori.

translation.en: Neither one of us knows how to fly like you can.
translation.it: Nessuno di noi vola come te.

translation.en: We need you to get us to the White House, but we wouldn't be doing our job if we weren't being honest with you.
translation.it: Tu ci porterai alla Casa Bianca, ma noi dobbiamo essere sinceri con te.

translation.en: If we don't tell it like it is, we'll all crash.
Okay, what's my next move?
We need to get you a running mate that softens you up.
Someone undeniably real.
I recommend a student from the special ed class.
I believe the proper modern vernacular for them is "differently abled."
translation.it: Credo che in gergo si dica "diversamente abile".

translation.en: So, you're going for the sympathy vote, am I right? What do you mean?
translation.it: - Punti ai voti di simpatia? - Che vuoi dire?

translation.en: Well, it's not like we're super good friends.
translation.it: Beh, non è che siamo super amici.

translation.en: Been going to school together for three years, the most you and I have ever said to each other is, "Hello."
translation.it: Andiamo a scuola insieme da tre anni e a malapena ci salutiamo.

translation.en: So, you obviously have some sort of strategy in mind.
translation.it: Quindi, hai in mente qualche strategia.

translation.en: The only strategy I'm interested in is being a president for every student at this school.
translation.it: La mia unica strategia è essere il presidente di tutti.

translation.en: That includes people like you, who traditionally have not been well represented in student government.
translation.it: Inclusi quelli come te, tradizionalmente poco rappresentati.

translation.en: What exactly does that mean, "people like me"?
C'mon. I mean someone with a disability, someone who might enjoy sharing the spotlight for once
translation.it: Persone con disabilità, che potrebbero apprezzare i riflettori

translation.en: and having a hand in shaping the culture at this school.
translation.it: e la possibilità di plasmare la cultura a scuola.

translation.en: And "student body vice president" looks pretty good on a college application.
translation.it: E "vicepresidente" fa bella figura sulla domanda per il college.

translation.en: Oh, how thrilling.
What, so you are not even gonna consider it?
[man] Eat a fat one!
John McCain tried that. It was a disaster.
translation.it: John McCain ci ha provato. Un disastro.

translation.en: Your family once hired Pinkertons to bust up union organizers.
translation.it: I tuoi hanno fatto arrestare dei sindacalisti.

translation.en: You have three lesser Picassos in your housekeeper's room in your home.
translation.it: Avete tre Picasso nella stanza della domestica.

translation.en: Annie Leibovitz took your family Christmas card photo last year
translation.it: Annie Leibovitz vi ha fatto la foto di Natale

translation.en: and you have a 4.3 GPA.
You're untouchable. You need a running mate that can humanize you.
translation.it: Sei intoccabile. Ti serve un vice per umanizzarti.

translation.en: So, what kind of music do you like?
Britney Spears and Insane Clown Posse.
translation.it: Britney Spears e gli Insane Clown Posse.

translation.en: Yeah, me too.
If you had the chance to stand up in front of the whole school,
translation.it: Se potessi alzarti davanti a tutti

translation.en: and you could say anything you wanted, what would you say?
translation.it: e dire qualsiasi cosa, cosa diresti?

translation.en: I don't know.
Well, what would you want to get off your chest? Like, if you could change one thing, what would it be?
translation.it: Che sassolino vorresti toglierti? Cosa cambieresti, se potessi?

translation.en: Everyone should quit being a faker.
translation.it: Le persone dovrebbero smettere di essere false.

translation.en: Alice? What do you think?
I love you. Unconditionally.
You are the front man of my favorite rock band,
translation.it: Sei il frontman della mia band preferita,

translation.en: you are the star of my favorite movie, you are my king of kings.
translation.it: la star del mio film preferito, sei il mio re dei re.

translation.en: Nothing is going to stop you from winning this election
translation.it: Niente ti impedirà di vincere le elezioni

translation.en: and turning this school upside down.
But you've got to listen to your advisors.
[woman] I'm just so happy to be alive.
I love when I can get outside into the sunshine
translation.it: Adoro poter uscire alla luce del sole

translation.en: and smell the ocean, you know?
-Are you not eating lunch? -[Beethoven's "Für Elise" playing]
No. No, with the chemo I don't always have an appetite.
translation.it: No, con la chemio non ho sempre appetito.

translation.en: My Nana says I have to eat,
translation.it: Mia nonna dice che devo mangiare,

translation.en: but it's just the medicine I take, it makes everything taste so spicy.
translation.it: ma la medicina che prendo rende tutto molto piccante.

translation.en: I'm so sorry to hear that. I...
I cannot imagine what that must be like. High school is hard enough as it is.
translation.it: Non immagino come dev'essere. Il liceo è già difficile così.

translation.en: I just don't look at it that way.
I think that every day is a gift.
translation.it: Penso che ogni giorno sia un dono.

translation.en: And every time that I wake up,
translation.it: E ogni volta che mi sveglio,

translation.en: even if I have to get a platelet transfusion from Dr. Sengal,
translation.it: anche se devo fare una trasfusione di piastrine,

translation.en: I think to myself,
"A lot of kids around the world don't have the same medical care that I do. So...
translation.it: "Molti bambini nel mondo non hanno le stesse cure mediche che ho io.

translation.en: If that's what I have to go through, that's God's plan."
translation.it: Se è quello che devo affrontare, significa che Dio vuole così".

translation.en: I'm looking for a VP candidate, because I'm running for student body president.
translation.it: Cerco un vice, perché sono candidato presidente.

translation.en: Yes, I heard. Andrea told me. She's, um... She said you were good at the debate.
translation.it: Sì, ho sentito. Me l'ha detto Andrea. Secondo lei, sei stato bravo al dibattito.

translation.en: She takes notes for me when I can't be at school.
translation.it: Prende appunti per me quando manco.

translation.en: I wish I could've been there, but...
a lot of nice people heard about my chemo and they paid for me to go to Disneyland with my Nana,
translation.it: Alcuni hanno sentito della mia chemio e mi hanno mandato a Disneyland.

translation.en: and we got to skip all the lines and it was so much fun.
translation.it: Io e nonna abbiamo saltato tutte le file, è stato divertente.

translation.en: Best day ever!
What?
What are you--? Why are you looking at me like that?
[stammers] I don't know. I just...
I really like you, Infinity.
You're so real.
We'd like a table for two, please.
-Sure, do you have a reservation? -Yes. Jackson.
Dusty and Infinity Jackson.
I'm sorry. I don't see a reservation under any of those names.
translation.it: Scusi, non vedo prenotazioni a quel nome.

translation.en: Well, that doesn't make any sense. I mean, I know I definitely called.
translation.it: Beh, non può essere. So di aver chiamato.

translation.en: Sorry. We're fully booked until 9:30.
translation.it: Scusi. Siamo al completo fino alle 21:30.

translation.en: Would you like to make a reservation for then?
Karen, I want you to meet someone.
Infinity, say hello to Karen.
-Hello, Karen. -Hi.
You were really looking forward to eating here, weren't you, babydoll?
translation.it: Non vedevi l'ora di mangiare qui, vero, bambolina?

translation.en: Hell, I said, "Let's go to Coco's."
I was so excited. I love me some of that Coco's pot pie.
translation.it: Ero così emozionata. Adoro il loro pasticcio di carne.

translation.en: No, but you dug in. You said, "I want Olive Garden, Nana."
translation.it: Ma tu ti sei intromessa e hai detto: "Voglio andare all'Olive Garden, nonna".

translation.en: -[chuckling] -I want Olive Garden, Nana. I do.
I just got my feeding tube taken out, and my Nana said,
translation.it: Mi hanno tolto la sonda gastrica e la nonna ha detto:

translation.en: "Sure, yeah. You want endless breadsticks, let's go for it."
translation.it: "Certo. Andiamo a mangiare tutti i grissini che vuoi".

translation.en: Why don't you tell Karen about your cancer? Hmm?
translation.it: Perché non le racconti del cancro?

translation.en: You're in pain sometimes, aren't you?
I'm sorry. I couldn't help overhear.
Uh, we're ahead of you, but we'd really like you to have our table.
translation.it: Siamo davanti a voi, ma vorrei cedervi il nostro tavolo.

translation.en: -Oh, no. No, we couldn't poss-- -[woman] Please, I insist.
translation.it: - Oh, no. Non potrei mai. - Insisto.

translation.en: We'd also like to pay for your meal.
Oh, I...
I don't know what to say. Thank you so much.
translation.it: Non so cosa dire. Grazie mille.

translation.en: [woman] It's our pleasure.
You really ought to be ashamed of yourself.
Bye.
It's blinking.
I can take your buzzer.
[Karen] Right this way.
Thank you.
Enjoy your evening. Thank you. You too.
translation.it: - Buona serata. - Grazie. Anche a voi.

translation.en: It's so good.
Jesus H. Christ. It's like Rome.
I mean, all you can eat, and then a quick trip to the vomitorium.
translation.it: Insomma... Mangi quanto vuoi e poi una gita al vomitorio.

translation.en: Dining out used to be something you earned. Well, like you have. But...
translation.it: Prima cenare fuori era una conquista. Come ora per te.

translation.en: Don't eat that fast!
You're gonna yack it all up like a baby bird. Spit it out.
translation.it: Lo rimetterai come un uccellino. Sputalo.

translation.en: Oh, Christ. Look at that. Jesus.
Don't forget, we have free tickets
translation.it: Non dimenticare che abbiamo i biglietti gratis

translation.en: to the Florida Georgia Line concert on Friday night.
translation.it: per il concerto dei Florida Georgia Line venerdì sera.

translation.en: We're gonna be sitting right up in front,
right in the handicap section, right next to the stage.
translation.it: nel settore dei portatori di handicap, vicino al palco.

translation.en: -Free tickets. Wow, cool. [chuckles] -Yeah.
So, how was school?
Okay. Payton asked me to be his vice president.
translation.it: Bene. Payton mi ha chiesto di fare la vicepresidentessa.

translation.en: Who's Payton?
He's a boy who's running for school president and he asked me to--
translation.it: È uno che si candida alla presidenza e mi ha chiesto...

translation.en: Jesus Christ, he's going to get more food.
translation.it: Cristo, va a prendere altro cibo.

translation.en: Yeah.
What? He asked you to be what?
He asked me to be his running mate.
translation.it: Mi ha chiesto di fare la sua vice.

translation.en: -Yeah? -I don't really know. I mean, he's rich.
translation.it: - Capito. - Ma non so, lui è ricco.

translation.en: -He's really cute. -Well, I hope you said yes.
translation.it: - È molto carino. - Spero tu abbia detto di sì.

translation.en: I said no.
Why?
[softly] I don't know.
[softly] Sad.
I felt like he was using me, and I don't like to be used.
translation.it: Sentivo che mi stava usando e non mi piace essere usata.

translation.en: [Dusty sighs] You know what?
You're gonna finish your endless bread basket right now.
translation.it: Ora mangia tutti i grissini che vuoi,

translation.en: And tomorrow, you are gonna march up to that boy and you are going to say,
translation.it: e domani andrai da quel ragazzo e dirai:

translation.en: "Thank you very much. I accept your offer."
Something like this could change your life.
translation.it: Una cosa del genere potrebbe cambiarti la vita.

translation.en: Do you understand me?
You can be vice president.
Aim high. Yeah.
You can get it all.
-Hi, Infinity. -[gasps] Hi. Jesus!
So, listen, I just was wondering if you had thought any more about my offer.
translation.it: Mi chiedevo se avessi riflettuto sulla mia offerta.

translation.en: -I've thought about it. -Mm-hmm.
The answer is no.
-Why? -I don't need to tell you.
[woman whispers] Payton!
We have a problem.
[River] That's why I'm proud to announce my running mate,
translation.it: Ecco perché sono fiero di annunciare la mia alleata,

translation.en: your next student body vice president,
Thank you so much, River.
And, uh, thank you for giving students at Saint Sebastian
translation.it: E grazie per aver dato agli studenti del Saint Sebastian

translation.en: the historic opportunity to elect a gender non-conforming African-American
translation.it: l'opportunità di eleggere un'afroamericana dal genere non conforme

translation.en: to be their vice president.
Now, I can't promise that I'm always gonna agree with you.
translation.it: Non posso promettere di essere sempre d'accordo con te.

translation.en: I have a reputation for speaking my mind loudly when I disagree with someone,
translation.it: Sono famosa perché mi faccio sentire quando non sono d'accordo con qualcuno,

translation.en: but I can promise you strength, fortitude, and the passion
translation.it: ma ti prometto forza, coraggio e passione

translation.en: to make Saint Sebastian an amazing place.
translation.it: per rendere questa scuola un posto meraviglioso.

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -Thank you.
Why are you doing this to me? Why did you have to pick Skye Leighton?
translation.it: Perché mi fai questo? Perché Skye Leighton?

translation.en: Astrid said if I picked her, I'd have my best shot at winning.
translation.it: Astrid dice che, con lei, posso vincere.

translation.en: Why are you listening to her? She doesn’t want what's good for you, she wants power.
translation.it: Perché le dai retta? Lei pensa solo al potere.

translation.en: You're the way she's gonna get it. She's Lady Macbeth!
translation.it: Ti usa. È come Lady McBeth!

translation.en: -You gotta calm down. -She's jealous of us, can't you see that?
translation.it: - Payton, calmati. - È gelosa di noi.

translation.en: That is why she's trying to take this away from me!
Why are you hurting me?
You-- You have so much pain.
You don't need any of this. You're gonna go to college and join the Peace Corps.
translation.it: A te non serve. Andrai al college e ti unirai ai Corpi di Pace.

translation.en: This isn't gonna help you.
I'm sorry.
I really did love you.
-[gun cocks, fires] -[Payton] No!
I wanna bag a Shiras moose.
I wanna bag a Siberian buffalo.
All right. I wanna bag... Margaret Edmund Meyers.
translation.it: Va bene. DICIOTTO MESI PRIMA Io Margaret Edmund Meyers.

translation.en: -Maggie Meyers? -Yes, Maggie Meyers.
-I already did. -Really?
-Full bush. -Dude, nice!
[Payton] Firstly, it's illegal to hunt Siberian bison.
translation.it: È illegale cacciare il bisonte siberiano.

translation.en: Secondly, when you talk about bagging things, you sound like douchebags, especially with your mother present.
translation.it: E poi, quando parlate di infilzare cose, sembrate dei veri coglioni.

translation.en: You should totally come hunting with us, Payton.
translation.it: - Vieni a caccia con noi. - Così possiamo spararti alle spalle.

translation.en: Yeah, that way we could accidentally shoot you in the back.
translation.it: - Vieni a caccia con noi. - Così possiamo spararti alle spalle. MEMORIE

translation.en: -[both laughing] -That's enough!
Yo, that's good, Mom.
It's for a series I'm doing to raise awareness and money
translation.it: È per sensibilizzare e raccogliere fondi

translation.en: for the Syrian war debt.
This is Orhan. He was killed in an airstrike earlier in the year.
translation.it: Questo è Orhan, ucciso in un attacco aereo a inizio anno.

translation.en: Bummer.
Are you boys gonna be back for dinner?
No, we have that event in support of eliminating net neutrality.
translation.it: No, c'è l'evento contro la neutralità della rete.

translation.en: How can you be for eliminating net neutrality?
translation.it: Cosa ci sarà mai da essere contrari?

translation.en: This family holds 54 million dollars in telecom stocks.
-He doesn’t care, he's barely in the will. -Boys!
translation.it: Tanto lui non è nel testamento. Ragazzi!

translation.en: Why are you always defending him?
Because you're bullies. And you're borderline psychopaths.
translation.it: Perché siete dei bulli. E al limite della psicopatia.

translation.en: Of course you're in the will, same as them.
translation.it: Certo che sei nel testamento, come loro.

translation.en: I saw to that.
Don't tell your father.
You know, I read this study
from Columbia.
It says that it's impossible for a parent to love an adopted child as much as a biological one.
translation.it: Dice che un genitore non può amare un figlio adottivo quanto uno biologico.

translation.en: Parents are programmed to be drawn to the children that look most like them.
translation.it: I genitori sono attirati dai bambini più simili a loro.

translation.en: I would assume it has something to do with protecting bloodlines.
Well, I would say that's a flawed study, because I love you the most.
translation.it: È uno studio inattendibile, perché tu sei il mio preferito.

translation.en: I always have.
You're just saying that because they grew up to be such jerkwads.
translation.it: Lo dici solo perché loro sono dei cretini.

translation.en: You're not wrong about that.
You can't teach kindness.
You know? I tried for a long time.
translation.it: Ci ho provato per tanto tempo.

translation.en: Can't do much with small hearts.
translation.it: Non si può cambiare un cuore piccolo.

translation.en: Hard hearts, maybe, but not small ones.
translation.it: Un cuore di pietra, forse, ma non uno piccolo.

translation.en: I love them, don't get me wrong, I just...
The love has edges.
It doesn't go on and on the way my love for you does.
translation.it: Mentre il mio amore per te è costante.

translation.en: And you felt that way about me right away?
translation.it: Mi hai amato fin da subito?

translation.en: Like you were a part of me.
It wasn't a meeting, it was a reunion.
translation.it: Non è stato un incontro, ma una rimpatriata.

translation.en: This funny, dark, Jewish hair. These big Disney eyes. And...
translation.it: Quei buffi capelli neri ebrei. Quei grandi occhi disneyani.

translation.en: You were alone in the world.
And I suppose I felt that way about myself.
translation.it: E credo mi sentissi così anche io.

translation.en: Don't ever listen to your brothers about who they say you are
translation.it: Non ascoltare i tuoi fratelli quando parlano di te

translation.en: or what you might do in this world.
translation.it: o di ciò che potresti fare al mondo.

translation.en: [singsong] There's my surprise!
[in English] Can I use your restroom?
Well, yes, of course. Just follow the path up to the main house.
translation.it: Certo. Segui il sentiero fino alla casa.

translation.en: There's staff.
-You could've at least said hello. -What is he doing here?
translation.it: - Potevi almeno salutare. - Che ci fa lui qui?

translation.en: He's your new Mandarin tutor.
That's River Barkley, he's incredibly popular at school.
translation.it: È River Barkley, è molto popolare a scuola.

translation.en: So are you.
Not his kind of popular. And he's dating my arch-nemesis, Astrid Sloan.
translation.it: Lui di più ed esce con la mia arcinemica, Astrid Sloan.

translation.en: She called me a fag in second grade. I'm not even gay.
translation.it: Mi ha dato del frocio, e io non sono gay.

translation.en: Well, he comes very highly recommended.
translation.it: Mi hanno parlato bene di lui.

translation.en: I suggest you make him like you -and have Astrid Sloan be very jealous. -[sighs]
translation.it: Ti suggerisco di farlo affezionare a te così da fare ingelosire Astrid Sloan.

translation.en: Fine.
Every single one of these books is an autobiography.
translation.it: Ognuno di questi libri è un'autobiografia.

translation.en: I like to read about how others achieved their greatness
translation.it: Mi piace leggere le loro storie di grandezza

translation.en: so that I can mimic what worked.
translation.it: per imitare ciò che ha funzionato.

translation.en: You know, fake it till you make it.
What?
I fake it a lot too.
People think I'm... all calm.
translation.it: La gente pensa che io sia calmo.

translation.en: I don't know if I really am.
translation.it: Non so se lo sono davvero.

translation.en: It's sometimes like I'm...
feeling the whole world at once, you know?
translation.it: di sentire tutto il mondo insieme.

translation.en: Uh, where did you learn Mandarin?
My dad works for Goldman, so we lived in Shanghai until I was ten.
translation.it: Mio padre lavora per Goldman. Ho vissuto a Shanghai a lungo.

translation.en: -[in English] "Bathroom"? -[chuckles] Do you want to start?
-Oh, yeah, sure. -Yeah.
[in English] Why are you so tense?
How do you know I'm tense?
I just do.
You don't seem very happy.
Are you happy?
I try to be.
I try to be too.
[voice quavers] I really try.
It's so hard to have to try so hard all the time.
translation.it: È dura doversi sforzare così tanto.

translation.en: Okay, that was weird.
translation.it: Ok, è stato strano. Come hai fatto a rendermi così vulnerabile?

translation.en: Um, how did you get me to be vulnerable like that?
translation.it: è stato strano. Come hai fatto a rendermi così vulnerabile?

translation.en: I'm never like that. [sniffles]
I know.
It's just kinda a thing I do with people.
Maybe it was just what you needed.
translation.it: Forse era quello che ti serviva.

translation.en: What do you need?
[in English] I don't know what that means.
Can I kiss you?
See you next time?
[Payton] Excuse me. Languages?
-[woman] Third stack. -[Payton] Thank you.
I'm gonna dive right in.
I know what's going on between you and River.
translation.it: So cosa succede fra te e River.

translation.en: He told me what happened.
I was mad at first, but then I admired his honesty.
translation.it: All'inizio ero arrabbiata, ma ammiro la sua onestà.

translation.en: River and I have complete transparency.
translation.it: Io e River ci diciamo tutto.

translation.en: I've always known he was fluid. I am too, sorta.
translation.it: Sapevo già che era fluido. Come me, più o meno.

translation.en: And if you're the way he deals with that part of himself, that's fine.
translation.it: Se vuole gestire quella parte di sé così, va bene,

translation.en: But I want in too.
Come over to my house after school.
translation.it: Vieni da me dopo la scuola.

translation.en: Let’s all get it on.
I don't know where the gun came from. Um...
He just turned away for a moment and then he had it in his hand and then he shot himself.
translation.it: Si è voltato per un attimo e all'improvviso si è sparato.

translation.en: [officer] Son, look at me.
I never heard a sound like that before.
translation.it: Non avevo mai sentito un suono così.

translation.en: I need you to focus and tell me everything you remember.
translation.it: Devi concentrarti e dirmi tutto quello che ricordi.

translation.en: What happened?
He killed himself.
He did this because of you.
-[officer] Miss? -I have to see him.
-Sorry, you can’t-- -I have to see him! I’m his girlfriend.
translation.it: - Non può... - Sono la sua ragazza!

translation.en: I should be crying.
Why aren't I crying?
It's not you.
They told me when you were born you didn't even cry.
translation.it: Non hai pianto quando sei nato.

translation.en: You just came out and looked at everyone with a furrowed brow.
translation.it: Hai solo guardato tutti con la fronte corrucciata.

translation.en: I’m worried... that I...
that I don't have the same feelings everyone else does.
I think a lot of young people feel that way, especially nowadays.
translation.it: Penso che molti giovani la pensino così di questi tempi.

translation.en: Your generation got the terrible idea
translation.it: La tua generazione ha pensato fosse meglio

translation.en: that it was best to vomit every thought and feeling all over each other.
translation.it: vomitarsi addosso ogni pensiero e sentimento.

translation.en: It's a pandemic of overcommunication that's led to an absence of intimacy.
translation.it: La comunicazione eccessiva ha portato a una mancanza di intimità.

translation.en: It's more than that for me.
What if I'm just wired differently?
I mean, what if I can't feel for anyone else?
translation.it: E se... ...non provassi nulla per la gente?

translation.en: They say that sociopaths can't do that.
What if all I'll ever able to do is pretend to feel?
translation.it: E se riuscissi soltanto a fingere di provare emozioni?

translation.en: Does it matter if you can’t tell the difference?
translation.it: È importante se non capisci la differenza?

translation.en: I'm sorry about River.
He was a wonderful boy.
[woman] This is gonna sound awful, but I'm just gonna say it.
translation.it: Sembrerà terribile, ma lo dirò e basta.

translation.en: Now that River's dead, you're running unopposed.
-Seriously? -I can't believe you just said that.
Sorry, but it's my job.
-[Payton sighs] -You know you don't have to do this.
I want to.
[woman] And while they ask that you respect their privacy at this time,
translation.it: E mentre chiedono di rispettare la loro privacy,

translation.en: River's family wishes to express their gratitude
translation.it: i familiari di River desiderano esprimere

translation.en: for the outpouring of support they have received in the last few days.
translation.it: la propria gratitudine per il sostegno ricevuto negli ultimi giorni.

translation.en: It's trying times like these
where we, as a community, look to our student leaders
translation.it: che noi, come comunità, guardiamo ai nostri leader

translation.en: for a way to move forward and begin to heal.
translation.it: per capire come andare avanti e guarire.

translation.en: Payton?
I didn't really get to know River until last year.
translation.it: Ho conosciuto River solo l'anno scorso.

translation.en: He was my tutor.
Then he became my friend.
And then, my opponent.
We found ourselves running against one another, but River never made it feel like a competition.
translation.it: Ci sfidavamo, ma River non l'ha mai fatta sembrare una gara.

translation.en: He would always say, "Don’t worry about it, Payton. Let the best man win."
translation.it: Diceva sempre: "Non preoccuparti, Payton. Che vinca il migliore".

translation.en: Now, the best man can't win.
Uh, River was very active in the drama department,
so I've asked one of his many friends to help me sing a song in his honor.
translation.it: così ho chiesto a uno dei suoi amici di aiutarmi a cantare in suo onore.

translation.en: ♪ It's coming on Christmas They're cutting down trees ♪
translation.it: Arriva il Natale Si adorna l'abete

translation.en: ♪ Putting up reindeer Singing songs of joy and peace ♪
translation.it: Si appendon le renne Cantando canzoni gioiose e liete

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
♪ I could skate away on ♪
♪ But it don't snow here ♪
♪ It stays pretty green ♪
♪ Gonna make a lot of money Then I’m gonna quit this crazy scene ♪
translation.it: Farò un sacco di soldi E terrò le mie porte aperte

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
♪ I could skate away on ♪
♪ Oh, I wish I had a river so long ♪
translation.it: Vorrei tanto avere un fiume lunghissimo

translation.en: ♪ I would teach my feet to fly ♪
translation.it: Insegnerei ai miei piedi a volare

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
♪ I could skate away on ♪
♪ I made my baby cry ♪
translation.it: Ho fatto piangere il mio tesoro

translation.en: ♪ He tried hard to help me You know, he put me at ease ♪
translation.it: Ha provato a darmi una mano Curando il mio malessere

translation.en: ♪ And he loved me so naughty Made me weak in the knees ♪
translation.it: E mi ha amato in modo malizioso Facendo tremare tutto il mio essere

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
♪ I could skate away on ♪
♪ Oh, I wish I had a river so long ♪
translation.it: Vorrei tanto avere un fiume lunghissimo

translation.en: ♪ I would teach my feet to fly ♪
translation.it: Insegnerei ai miei piedi a volare

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
♪ I could skate away on ♪
♪ I made my baby say goodbye ♪
translation.it: Ho fatto dire addio al mio tesoro

translation.en: ♪ It's coming on Christmas They're cutting down trees ♪
translation.it: Arriva il Natale Si adorna l'abete

translation.en: ♪ They're putting up reindeer And singing songs of joy and peace ♪
translation.it: Si appendon le renne Cantando canzoni gioiose e liete

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
♪ I could skate away on ♪
[Payton] River's girlfriend, Astrid, has asked to say a few words.
translation.it: Astrid, la ragazza di River, ha chiesto di parlare.

translation.en: Thank you, Payton, that was beautiful. I’m sure River would've appreciated it.
translation.it: Grazie, Payton, è stato bellissimo. River avrebbe apprezzato.

translation.en: You were right when you said the best man can't win.
translation.it: Hai ragione, il migliore non può vincere.

translation.en: There was only one person in this race up for the job.
translation.it: Solo uno dei due candidati poteva farcela.

translation.en: And now he's gone.
That is why I've decided to run in River's place.
translation.it: Perciò ho deciso di candidarmi al suo posto.

translation.en: -My running mate will be Skye Leighton. -[applause]
translation.it: La mia vice sarà Skye Leighton.

translation.en: We will try to be the first all-female ticket in this school's history.
translation.it: Saremo la prima squadra tutta al femminile della storia.

translation.en: If you believed in what River stood for,
translation.it: Se condividevate i valori di River...

translation.en: good, because so did I.
And if you give me your vote,
then together, we can keep River's memory alive.
translation.it: insieme, possiamo tenere in vita la memoria di River.

translation.en: Thank you.
You wanted to see me?
This came for you.
Open it.
Waitlisted.
[sighs] Sweetheart.
A lifetime of focus and planning,
translation.it: Una vita di pianificazione e analisi

translation.en: carefully studying applications obtained on the black market
to pinpoint the exact combination of extracurriculars and test scores
translation.it: per trovare il giusto equilibrio tra attività extra e voti

translation.en: that would optimize my chances at acceptance.
Three years on that stupid literary magazine. Model UN. And service-oriented summer camp in Costa Rica.
translation.it: Rivista letteraria, simulazione ONU e campo estivo per aiutare il Costa Rica.

translation.en: Flippin' Mandarin!
-They haven't said no. -This is worse. This is worse than no.
translation.it: Non è ancora detto. Questo è peggio.

translation.en: This is-- This is, "Let's wait and see if we find anybody better."
translation.it: È un: "Vediamo se troviamo di meglio!"

translation.en: This is, "Even if we take you, you're our second choice." Why didn't-- Why didn't they want me?
translation.it: Così sarei sempre una seconda scelta. Perché non mi vogliono?

translation.en: They took those morons. Well, your father and I bought their way in.
translation.it: - Hanno preso quegli idioti. - Perché abbiamo pagato.

translation.en: You were very clear. You said you wanted to do this properly.
translation.it: Tu hai detto chiaramente che volevi fare le cose per bene.

translation.en: No, I can't get in that way. People know it. It stays with you.
translation.it: Non posso entrare così, si saprebbe.

translation.en: It's-- It's handing your opponent a negative ad on a platter.
translation.it: Dà all'avversario un appiglio su un piatto d'argento.

translation.en: Come here.
Don't litter.
Okay.
Waitlisted is not "no" and you're going to get in.
translation.it: La lista d'attesa non è un no.

translation.en: You're the most exceptional human being I've ever met.
translation.it: Sei l'essere più eccezionale che conosca.

translation.en: Hold on. You must've gotten your letter today too.
translation.it: Aspetta. Tu hai ricevuto la lettera?

translation.en: I'm sure that they have an algorithm that demands they take so many women
translation.it: Immagino abbiano un algoritmo per le quote rosa

translation.en: and so many applicants from this group or that.
translation.it: e per i gruppi di vario genere.

translation.en: Yes, I got in.
Alice, please, don't diminish your accomplishments to soothe my ego.
translation.it: Non sminuire i tuoi traguardi per non ferire il mio ego.

translation.en: You're gonna be valedictorian.
You have a gold medal in fencing from the Junior Olympics.
You speak six languages.
No one deserves to go to Harvard more than you.
translation.it: Nessuno merita di andare ad Harvard più di te.

translation.en: -And I am so happy for you. -[giggles]
Tonight is about getting you back on your feet 100%,
translation.it: Stasera ti rimettiamo in piedi al 100%,

translation.en: so you can win this election and make this world a better place.
translation.it: così vincerai le elezioni e migliorerai il mondo.

translation.en: Thomas, please go set up your table in the massage room.
translation.it: Thomas, prepara il lettino dei massaggi.

translation.en: You'll give Payton a treatment as soon as we're done.
Reiki, cups, and acupuncture.
-You're too good to be true. -[chuckles]
I have a plan to help you win.
But first, I need to ask you some questions,
and I need you to answer me honestly, no judgment.
I swear.
Did you kill River?
I won't judge you or turn you in. I just want to know.
translation.it: Non ti giudico e non ti denuncio. Voglio solo saperlo.

translation.en: While you didn't anticipate Astrid jumping into the campaign,
translation.it: Non sapevi che Astrid sarebbe subentrata

translation.en: you might have correctly thought that River dying would be your clearest path to victory.
translation.it: e potresti aver pensato di avere più chance, senza di lui.

translation.en: I didn't kill him.
We need to break up.
-You said you wouldn't judge me! -Not really break up.
translation.it: - Mi giudichi? - È solo per finta.

translation.en: We need to pretend to break up in order for you to win the election.
translation.it: Dobbiamo fingere per farti vincere le elezioni.

translation.en: Right now, you and Astrid are splitting the sympathy vote.
translation.it: Il voto di simpatia è diviso tra te e Astrid.

translation.en: I'm going to confess that I cheated on you.
It'll be a scandal.
You will dump me and everyone will feel sorry for you.
translation.it: Mi lascerai e tutti si dispiaceranno per te.

translation.en: I've cleared with McAfee and James.
translation.it: Ho chiesto a McAfee e James.

translation.en: They think it could gain you six to nine points, depending on how magnanimous you are about the whole thing.
translation.it: Potresti guadagnare fino a nove punti, in base a quanto sei magnanimo.

translation.en: But everyone will hate you.
I love you.
This... is what love looks like, Payton.
This is what sacrifice looks like.
This is what it takes to change the world.
translation.it: È ciò che serve per cambiare il mondo.

translation.en: I am your first lady today...
translation.it: Sono la tua first lady oggi

translation.en: and always.
-But there are rules. -Rules?
translation.it: - Ma ci sono delle regole. - Regole?

translation.en: We will break up
long enough for you to win and for no one to suspect duplicity on our parts.
translation.it: abbastanza a lungo da farti vincere e da non destare sospetti.

translation.en: You will post photos of Big Sur,
the truffle french fries at Hoagies Diner on Route 14,
translation.it: delle patatine al tartufo del diner sulla Route 14

translation.en: and cute dogs on your Instagram at least once a day with captions like,
translation.it: e di cani carini su Instagram almeno una volta al giorno con frasi tipo:

translation.en: "Wish I was here," and "Yummy," and "heart emoji."
When you do so, I will know you were thinking of me.
translation.it: Quando lo farai, saprò che pensavi a me.

translation.en: A secret code. I love it.
And, most importantly,
when you pass me in the hall, you will not pay me any mind.
translation.it: quando mi vedrai in corridoio, non mi guarderai nemmeno.

translation.en: But as soon as we're past each other, you will turn and look back.
translation.it: Ma non appena ci saremo superati, ti girerai e guarderai indietro.

translation.en: I need you to do this for me or I won't be able to survive.
translation.it: Ho bisogno che tu lo faccia per me, o non sopravviverò.

translation.en: Do you agree to these terms?
You are the best thing that will ever happen to me.
translation.it: Sei la cosa più bella che mi sia capitata.

translation.en: Yes.
I agree.
Let's move on to fish course.
I don't want to say "I'm overwhelmed with shame."
translation.it: Non voglio dire che sono sopraffatta dalla vergogna.

translation.en: -That's too calculating, it sounds fake. -It is fake.
translation.it: - Sembra troppo finto. - Ma lo è.

translation.en: [typing] "I broke up with Payton tonight.
I guess you could say I cheated on him, though it's more complicated than that.
translation.it: Si può dire che l'ho tradito, anche se è più complicato.

translation.en: I will not name the other party involved at this time out of respect to their family. Period."
translation.it: Non nominerò l'altra parte per rispetto alla sua famiglia. Punto.

translation.en: That's good. Mysterious. Really makes you lean in.
Post it.
-[social media alerts] -This is good.
Jesus, people are freakin' animals. These comments are brutal.
translation.it: Che gente di merda. Questi commenti sono brutali.

translation.en: -[James] This is really good. -[social media alerts continue]
-Hi. -Hi.
I didn't like doing that.
I know.
It's the right thing to do.
Hey, Payton. We're ready when you are, buddy.
translation.it: Ehi, Payton. Siamo pronti quando vuoi, amico.

translation.en: Okay.
-♪ I felt the strangest emotion ♪ -[silent mouthing]
[man] Payton.
Hey, kiddo.
Look, I know you've been struggling with Mandarin and River was tutoring you.
translation.it: So che hai avuto problemi col cinese e che River ti dava lezioni.

translation.en: [sighs] You must be going through a lot right now.
Yeah, I am.
Just show up for the exams, and I'll give you an A.
translation.it: Presentati agli esami e ti darò una A.

translation.en: Okay?
Thank you.
Okay.
Hey, man, I'm really sorry.
[whispers] Numbers look great. Genius. Wish I'd thought of it. Go to the cafeteria and press some flesh.
translation.it: Geniale. Vorrei averci pensato io. Va' a parlare con la gente.

translation.en: Well, I can imagine.
Well, well, well. Oh.
Look who's home. [chuckles]
Ms. Fancypants, shut the door.
Yes, ma'am.
-Sit down. -Yes, ma'am.
[sighs] This lovely young man was telling me
translation.it: Questo adorabile giovanotto mi ha detto

translation.en: that you turned him down again as a running mate in the school election.
translation.it: che hai rifiutato di nuovo il ruolo di vice alle elezioni.

translation.en: That is twice now that you have defied me and I would like an explanation.
translation.it: Sono due volte che mi contraddici e vorrei una spiegazione.

translation.en: I just don't want all that attention.
Oh, don't you lie to me.
You were the one who begged me to call the Channel 13 news team
translation.it: Sei stata tu a pregarmi di chiamare il notiziario di Channel 13

translation.en: so you could get a free trip to Legoland.
translation.it: per farti fare un viaggio gratis a Legoland.

translation.en: And the second those cameras turned on, well, you just about peed your pants, you were so excited.
translation.it: E quando le telecamere si sono accese, te la sei fatta sotto dall'emozione.

translation.en: You know, actually, Ms. Jackson, uh, Infinity, I have--
translation.it: Ecco, sig.na Jackson... Infinity, ho visto tutti i servizi dei TG locali su di te

translation.en: I've seen all the local news stories on you and they are...
translation.it: Infinity, ho visto tutti i servizi dei TG locali su di te

translation.en: Oh, God, they're so inspiring. But I really think that this could be something even bigger.
translation.it: e sono una vera ispirazione, ma questa cosa è ancora più grossa.

translation.en: I think this could be a national news story.
Infinity, you could become the voice of a generation of handicapable children.
translation.it: Puoi diventare la voce di una generazione di bambini diversamente abili.

translation.en: You know, at the risk of sounding vulgar, it's worth remembering
translation.it: A rischio di sembrare volgare, puoi trasformare una cosa del genere

translation.en: that you could parlay something like that into serious, regular income
translation.it: A rischio di sembrare volgare, puoi trasformare una cosa del genere in un guadagno costante, anche solo con Instagram.

translation.en: just off of Instagram alone.
translation.it: in un guadagno costante, anche solo con Instagram.

translation.en: Wait a minute.
-We could make some money on this? -Absolutely. Oh, absolutely.
translation.it: - Potremmo farci dei soldi? - Assolutamente sì.

translation.en: Well, hot damn!
[Payton] If it would be at all helpful,
I'd be happy to provide you with a cash loan that could be used for anything.
translation.it: vi farei un prestito in denaro per ciò che volete.

translation.en: Paying off medical bills, buying a new car.
translation.it: Pagare le spese mediche, comprare un'auto.

translation.en: Wait a minute. A new car?
translation.it: Aspetta un attimo. Una macchina nuova?

translation.en: -[stammers] Anything. -[laughs] I like the sound of that.
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa! Mi piace questa idea.

translation.en: You know, I must say, I like the sound of your voice.
translation.it: E a me piace la sua voce.

translation.en: Really? Yeah?
Yeah, I really-- It's got a real melodic tone to it.
translation.it: Già. Ha davvero un tono melodico.

translation.en: Is that-- Are you from the South?
Well, I am a country girl.
I knew it. I knew it.
-West-goddamn-Virginia. [chuckles] -Of course.
Yeah, I drove all the way to California from Martinsville.
translation.it: Sì, ho guidato fino in California da Martinsville.

translation.en: You ever heard of Martinsville?
-I don't think I have. -[chuckles]
-Stop it. Stop it. Just stop it! -What?!
[whispers] I know what he's doing.
I know what you're doing.
Payton, you're trying to seduce us.
You're using your money and your interest
translation.it: Stai usando i tuoi soldi e il tuo interesse,

translation.en: and you're throwing it around like it's nothing.
Hey, you are being a rude little toad.
He's a fake, Nana. He's a fake. I don't trust anything that he says.
translation.it: È un falso, nonna. Non mi fido di niente di ciò che dice.

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
-I really do apologize, dear. -No, no, no.
translation.it: Mi scuso davvero. Mi dispiace tanto.

translation.en: -I am so sorry. -Uh, no, no, she's right.
translation.it: Mi scuso davvero. Mi dispiace tanto. No, ha ragione.

translation.en: She's right.
River died and... my girlfriend broke up with me
translation.it: River è morto, la mia ragazza mi ha lasciato

translation.en: and I don't think that I've processed any of it.
translation.it: e penso di non aver ancora elaborato il tutto.

translation.en: Um, I just keep acting like everything is normal.
I just keep going through the motions,
like nothing happened, but it did, I know that it did.
translation.it: come se non fosse successo niente, ma non è così.

translation.en: I know it did, and I still, I can't...
translation.it: So che è successo, ma non riesco

translation.en: I can't feel anything.
You're right, Infinity. You're right.
I'm a fake.
You shouldn't believe anything I say, because I don't know that I believe it either.
translation.it: Non dovresti credere a quello che dico, perché non so se ci credo neanche io.

translation.en: I think that's why I want you for a running mate. You're authentic and you're real,
translation.it: È per questo che ti voglio come vice. Tu sei autentica e reale,

translation.en: and I can't even face the truth because...
translation.it: È per questo che ti voglio come vice. Tu sei autentica e reale, e io non riesco ad affrontare la verità

translation.en: because the truth is... [sobs]
...the truth is that I loved him.
Oh, my God. I loved him so much. [gasping]
And now he's gone.
I'm so sorry, Payton.
I believe you now.
[whispers] Hey, I believe you.
[Infinity whispers] I'm sorry. Hey...
We got her.
Because that's what life's all about. It's not about avoiding adversity,
translation.it: Ecco il senso della vita. Non si tratta di evitare le avversità,

translation.en: it's how we handle the hard times when they come barging into our lives,
translation.it: ma di come affrontiamo i momenti difficili che distruggono

translation.en: destroying everything we hold dear.
translation.it: tutto ciò che ci è caro.

translation.en: And that's why I've got someone very special with me today.
translation.it: Ho una persona speciale con me oggi.

translation.en: Now, this is a girl that we've all met, but...
she's someone that I don't think a lot of us really know.
translation.it: ma credo che in pochi la conoscano davvero.

translation.en: And I think that the reason that I find her so inspiring
translation.it: La trovo una fonte di ispirazione perché,

translation.en: is because... I look at my life,
translation.it: La trovo una fonte di ispirazione perché, se guardo alla mia vita

translation.en: and what's happened in the past few weeks, even the past few hours, does not even compare
translation.it: e a quanto accaduto nelle ultime settimane o anche ore, niente è paragonabile

translation.en: to the struggles that this young woman has to face every moment of every day.
translation.it: alle sfide che lei deve affrontare ogni momento di ogni giorno.

translation.en: And yet, she looks at the future...
with hope and optimism
and a sense of humor.
Infinity, you inspire me.
That is why I'm proud to introduce you as my running mate today.
translation.it: E sono fiero di presentarti come mia vice.

translation.en: Ladies and gentleman, the next vice president of Saint Sebastian,
translation.it: Signore e signori, la futura vicepresidentessa,

translation.en: Infinity Jackson!
Thank you.
Oh, my God, that was so nice.
How about this one, huh? Let's hear it.
Thank you, my gosh, thank you. Uh...
I guess Payton's right.
My life hasn't always been easy, but my Nana-- my Nana always says,
translation.it: La mia vita non è sempre stata facile, ma mia nonna dice sempre:

translation.en: “Infinity Maybelline Jackson..."
Congrats on the musical, by the way. Nice to see you.
translation.it: Bel musical. È un piacere vederti.

translation.en: Hey, looking good, guys. Thanks for being here.
translation.it: Ti trovo bene. Grazie di essere qui.

translation.en: "...a lot worse than you." And she's right.
translation.it: "...molto peggio di te". E ha ragione.

translation.en: -She already has an 80% approval rating. -And a fan account on Instagram.
translation.it: - Ha l'80% dei consensi. - E ha già un account fan.

translation.en: [Infinity] I'm one of the lucky ones.
translation.it: E io sono tra i fortunati.

translation.en: Sit back and enjoy the show.
-But I'm counting my blessings today. -[exhales]
We're all lucky, aren't we?
-Hey, Andrew. -Eric.
Right, Eric, sorry.
You douchebag, my name is Andrew.
I'm here, I'm alive, I'm with all of you beautiful people.
translation.it: Sono qui, sono viva. Sono con tutti voi, bella gente.

translation.en: I was coming to find you. I’m really sorry. I want you to know this was a really--
translation.it: Volevo proprio parlarti. Mi dispiace, ma alla fine...

translation.en: She's scamming everyone, you know that, right?
translation.it: Sta fregando tutti, lo sai, vero?

translation.en: -What? Who? -Infinity.
It's all a big scam. She's not sick.
translation.it: È solo una truffa. Non è malata.

translation.en: Thank you, Payton.
Thank you, Saint Sebastian.
She's faking it.
[Infinity] I...
[laughs] I’m gonna work my butt off for you guys.
translation.it: mi farò il culo per voi.

translation.en: I mean, like, let's just get out there and win this thing!
translation.it: Insomma, andiamo là fuori e vinciamo!

translation.en: -Yeah! -[cheers and applause]
